about_me.des: I’m a data scientist with strong data engineer skills. I worked for more than 2 years in the financial sector disrupting the industry with innovative data analytics solutions. Right now, I am working in the mobile gaming sector, where I collaborate closely with the games, ads and user acquisition teams. Overall, I have more than 5 years experience working in Machine Learning and Big Data projects.

projects.imbalance: Repository with different resources that add some useful funcionalities to Spark ML when dealing with unbalanced datasets.
projects.uni: Repository with some of the coding projects completed during my BSc in Maths and Computer Science and my MSc in Data Science.
projects.contest: Repository with the code submitted to some programming contests I have participated in.
projects.shiny: My first project created in Shiny to test its funcionalities.

career.rovio_des: Working in the Data Engineering team. Creating ML models that game teams can use to personalise the game experience of their players.
career.ey_des: Working at EY's Wavespace innovation center in Madrid. After my involment in a project about delivering a data lake for a leading asset management company, I was promoted to senior consultant and worked as technical lead creating a service for a leading Nordic insurance company to automatically detect terms and figures from pictures of their invoices.
career.qliro_des: Qliro is a leader online payments provider in the Nordics. I was part of the BI team and involved in creating from scratch the company's data lake. I also did there my master thesis which consisted in creating machine learning models to detect fraud in payments.
career.hack_des: In December 2016 I participated at the first edition of the hackathon HackSociety and our team won the first place of the FotoNation challenge. Our winner program converted a laptop into a touch screen for drawing flow diagrams using two low quality cameras and a regular pencil.
career.kth_des: Second year of my EIT Digital Data Science Master. Specialization in Distributed Systems and Data Mining for Really Big Data.
career.summer: EIT Summer School about Smart Spaces, Helsinki
career.summer_des: In August 2016, I participated in the EIT Summer School about Smart Spaces that was held in Helsinki during two weeks. The classes were oriented to create a business plan about a smart spaces startup idea paying a special attention to solving real customer pains.
career.indizen_des: I did an internship with Indizen, a Spanish consulting company, as a member of its Big Data department. I was involved in a project to detect and analyze geolocated social media data to find emerging news in Barcelona for a newspaper.
career.vaciatucasa_des: I developed a Point of Sale sofware program for Vaciatucasa. This company needed a POS system to enable street market sells.
career.upm_des: I pursued my first year in the EIT Digital Data Science  double degree program.
career.crida_des: I worked at CRIDA as a a developer in the context of Eurpean Air Trafic Control projects. I was in charge of designing ETL processes to load data into the company's data warehouse.
career.ies_des: From March 2015 to May 2015 I was giving classes about databases to exchange American students.
career.math: Applied Math Department at UPM, Madrid
career.math_des: From December 2014 to March 2015 I developed ContestMaker, a graphic app in Java, using Processing, which eased the process of creating interdisciplicary student contests. I was in charge of gathering all the questions created by the students from twelve different subjects. The contest gave the student extra points in the subjects for creating the questions, enabled collaboration across student from different courses, and the best team in the competition won additional points.
career.degree_des: I was pursuing my Bachelor's Degree in Mathematics and Informatics.

publications.kth_title: Fraud detection in online payments using Spark ML
publications.kth_data: Master Thesis, Royal Institute of Technology (KTH), Stockholm, Sweden, 2017.
publications.upm_title: Presencia en Twitter de los candidatos a las elecciones madrileñas de 2015
publications.upm_data: BSc thesis, E.T.S. de Ingenieros Informáticos (UPM), Madrid, Spain, 2015.
